item.description:
Hi,

Bring your Chinese learning experiences, problems,
and stories to the next meetup! If you dont' speak
Chinese yet, you can come to talk about Chinese in
English and get yourself motivated to learn Chinese.
Again, everything said in Chinese will be repeated in
English, so no one will be left out.

Once we get to know each other better, then we'll
start to break out into smaller groups of 2 or 3 to
practice Chinese conversation more, after our
around-the-room introductions.

Our Asst. Organizer, Bobby, will host on my behalf
for the following 2 months, hope you all come and
have fun, learning and helping learning Chinese!

Best Regards,
Edwin

p.s. I'll be back after 8/19.
item.name: Help2LearnChinese June 26 Meetup
